page.title: 12Entertainment in Barnburgh.
page.content: Denaby Ings Nature Reserve has quite recently been extensively developed,supervised by the Yorkshire Wildlife Trust, it is within easy walking distance of the two villages. We're fortunate in having a good amount of land reserved for recreational facilities. There are village football teams for Under 11's, Under 12's, Under 13's and Under 14's, and they have their own football pitch. Golfers can choose from either Hickleton Golf Course or the High Melton Golf Course. There are livery stables situated in the old part of the village, and pasture is available for grazing. Barnburgh Male Voice Choir was formed in 1982. Practices are held in Barnburgh W.M.C. twice each week.A wide programme of events is undertaken.
